sentences.en: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.cn: 但您只有在实现所有方法的情况下才能获得最多的收益，因为它们的力量来自于它们之间的相互作用。

sentences.en: Exciton is electron - hole pair held together by their mutual Coulomb interaction.
sentences.cn: 激子就是由电子和空穴在相互间的库仑力作用下,相互维持在一起的电子 -- 空穴对.

sentences.en: He understood the interaction of particles of matter, and that's important to set the stage for the Rutherford experiment in Manchester about 10 years later.
sentences.cn: 他理解物质粒子之间的相互作用，这点很重要，对于10年后他在曼彻斯特搭设，用于卢瑟福实验的平台来说。

sentences.en: In other situations, there could be more than one interaction between the consumer and provider, each using a different protocol.
sentences.cn: 在另一种情况下，消费者和提供者之间会有超过一种的交互作用，每一种都是用不同的协议。

sentences.en: It is roughly 100 times stronger than the electromagnetic interaction.
sentences.cn: 它大体上比电磁相互作用强100倍.

sentences.en: Neutralization is the interaction of a base and an acid.
sentences.cn: 中和作用是碱和酸的相互作用.

sentences.en: Note: This is not about how the service is implemented, but rather the interaction between the consumers and providers for this service.
sentences.cn: 请注意：这与服务是如何被执行的并不相关，而是与服务的消费者和提供者之间的相互作用相关。

sentences.en: Price is determined through the interaction of demand and supply.
sentences.cn: 价格在供需的相互作用中形成。

sentences.en: Some very refined results may be expected in this age - old interaction.
sentences.cn: 在这么 长期 的、古老的关系的相互作用中,可以预料会出现某些非常精微的结果.

sentences.en: The automatic analysis may be helped by interaction with the experimenter.
sentences.cn: 自动分析也可因实验者的参与而得到帮助.

sentences.en: the complex interaction between mind and body
sentences.cn: 身心之间复杂的相互作用

sentences.en: the degree of interaction between teacher and student
sentences.cn: 师生之间交流的程度

sentences.en: The dynamic interaction of these three groups makes the economy function.
sentences.cn: 这三部分人之间有力地相互作用,从而推动着经济的运转.

sentences.en: The gravitational interaction is disregarded when interactions between individual protons are considered.
sentences.cn: 在考虑单个质子间相互作用时,万有引力可以忽略不计.

sentences.en: The interaction between user and expert system arising from the expert system 's use.
sentences.cn: 使用专家系统而发生的用户和专家系统之间的交互作用。

sentences.en: The interaction of antibiotics is conditioned by many factors.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素的相互作用受许多因素制约.

sentences.en: The interaction of the two groups produced many good ideas.
sentences.cn: 两个组的相互交流产生了许多好主意.

sentences.en: The real power of the concept comes not from any one of these devices; it emerges from the interaction of all of them.
sentences.cn: 这个概念的很正力量并不来自于这些设备的任何一个；它来自于这些设备之间的交互。

sentences.en: The two particles will undergo accelerations as a result of their interaction.
sentences.cn: 这两个粒子由于相互作用将获得加速度.

sentences.en: There may be an interaction between vegetation and climate.
sentences.cn: 在植被与气候间可能有某种交互作用.

sentences.en: This indicates that the protocol involves some interaction between these roles.
sentences.cn: 它指出了在这些角色之间涉及某些交互作用的协议。

sentences.en: This interaction does not alter the in - plane behavior of the structure.
sentences.cn: 这一相互作用并不改变结构平面内的特性.

sentences.en: This is probably the most important interaction design guideline.
sentences.cn: 这基本上是最重要的交互设计指导准则.

sentences.en: Viswanathan has analyzed the frictional interaction between fiber fringes.
sentences.cn: 维斯沃纳森分析了纤维须头间的相互摩擦作用.

phrases.tran_cn: 静电作用；静电相互作用；静电相互酌
互动分析；相互影响分件；交互分析
相互作用参数；相互酌参数
互动过程；相互作用过程
交互作用时间，相互酌时间
社会互动；社会干预；社会的相互作用

trans.tran_cn: 一起活动，合作，互相影响，互动，交流，沟通
trans.tran_en: a process by which two or more things affect each other
